pink primrose: A delicate pink flower with a rosette shape.
hard-leaved pocket orchid: A small orchid with tough, glossy leaves.
canterbury bells: A bell-shaped flower with vibrant colors.
sweet pea: A fragrant flower with soft, wavy petals.
english marigold: A bright orange or yellow flower with many layers.
tiger lily: An orange flower with black spots, resembling a tiger.
moon orchid: A white orchid with a round, moon-like appearance.
bird of paradise: A striking flower that resembles a colorful bird.
monkshood: A tall flower with a hood-like, deep purple bloom.
globe thistle: A round, spiky flower with a metallic blue color.
snapdragon: A tall flower with dragon-like, tubular blooms.
colt's foot: A yellow, dandelion-like flower that blooms early.
king protea: A large, crown-like flower with stiff petals.
spear thistle: A tall, spiky plant with purple blooms.
yellow iris: A bright yellow flower with tall, sword-shaped leaves.
globe-flower: A round, bright yellow flower resembling a globe.
purple coneflower: A spiky, purple flower with a raised center.
peruvian lily: A colorful, spotted flower with long petals.
balloon flower: A puffy, balloon-shaped flower that bursts open.
giant white arum lily: A large, elegant white flower with a yellow center.
fire lily: A bright red-orange flower with a flame-like appearance.
pincushion flower: A round flower with needle-like projections.
fritillary: A bell-shaped flower with a checkered pattern.
red ginger: A tall, red flower with vibrant spikes.
grape hyacinth: A cluster of small, purple bell-shaped flowers.
corn poppy: A bright red flower with delicate, crinkled petals.
prince of wales feathers: A feathery plant with tall, plume-like blooms.
stemless gentian: A small, deep blue flower that grows close to the ground.
artichoke: A large, thistle-like flower known for its edible buds.
sweet william: A colorful, fragrant flower with fringed petals.
carnation: A ruffled flower in a variety of colors.
garden phlox: A fragrant, multi-petaled flower in large clusters.
love in the mist: A delicate blue flower surrounded by fine, misty foliage.
mexican aster: A bright, daisy-like flower with long petals.
alpine sea holly: A spiky, blue-purple flower with stiff leaves.
ruby-lipped cattleya: A large, showy orchid with vibrant ruby lips.
cape flower: A colorful flower with a daisy-like shape.
great masterwort: A star-shaped flower with layers of tiny blooms.
siam tulip: A pink flower with soft, tulip-like petals.
lenten rose: A winter-blooming flower with rose-like petals.
barbeton daisy: A bright, daisy-like flower with bold colors.
daffodil: A yellow or white flower with a trumpet-shaped center.
sword lily: A tall flower with long, sword-like leaves and blooms.
poinsettia: A bright red or white flower popular during winter.
bolero deep blue: A deep blue flower with a star-shaped bloom.
wallflower: A fragrant flower that grows on walls or cliffs.
marigold: A bright orange or yellow flower with ruffled petals.
buttercup: A small, shiny yellow flower with cup-shaped petals.
oxeye daisy: A large, white daisy with a yellow center.
common dandelion: A yellow flower with fluffy, white seed heads.
petunia: A trumpet-shaped flower in many colors.
wild pansy: A small, colorful flower with heart-shaped petals.
primula: A low-growing plant with clusters of bright flowers.
sunflower: A tall flower with a large, yellow bloom and edible seeds.
pelargonium: A colorful, fragrant flower with rounded petals.
bishop of llandaff: A bright red, dahlia-like flower with dark leaves.
gaura: A delicate, butterfly-like flower with white or pink blooms.
geranium: A bright, round flower with ruffled petals.
orange dahlia: A vibrant orange flower with layered, pointed petals.
pink-yellow dahlia: A large flower with pink and yellow petals.
cautleya spicata: A red and yellow flower with long, spiky blooms.
japanese anemone: A delicate, pink or white flower with a yellow center.
black-eyed susan: A yellow flower with a dark brown center.
silverbush: A silver-leaved plant with small, white flowers.
californian poppy: A bright orange flower with delicate petals.
osteospermum: A daisy-like flower with colorful petals and a blue center.
spring crocus: A small, purple or white flower that blooms in early spring.
bearded iris: A tall flower with ruffled petals and a distinct 'beard.'
windflower: A delicate, wind-tossed flower in shades of white and pink.
tree poppy: A large, white poppy with a yellow center.
gazania: A colorful, daisy-like flower that blooms in sunlight.
azalea: A small, bright flower that grows in bushes.
water lily: A floating flower with large petals, found in ponds.
rose: A fragrant, layered flower in various colors.
thorn apple: A spiky, white flower with large leaves.
morning glory: A trumpet-shaped flower that blooms in the morning.
passion flower: A complex, exotic flower with vibrant colors.
lotus: A large, water-dwelling flower with broad petals.
toad lily: A spotted, orchid-like flower with a delicate appearance.
anthurium: A glossy, red flower with a heart-shaped bloom.
frangipani: A fragrant, white or pink flower with a tropical feel.
clematis: A climbing flower with large, showy blooms.
hibiscus: A large, colorful flower with a prominent stamen.
columbine: A delicate, bell-shaped flower with spurred petals.
desert-rose: A thick-stemmed plant with bright, rose-like flowers.
tree mallow: A tall, pink or purple flower with a hollyhock-like appearance.
magnolia: A large, fragrant flower that grows on trees.
cyclamen: A small, pink or white flower with upturned petals.
watercress: A small, edible plant with tiny white flowers.
canna lily: A bright, tropical flower with large, colorful blooms.
hippeastrum: A large, trumpet-shaped flower in bright colors.
bee balm: A bright, spiky flower that attracts bees.
ball moss: A small, round plant that clings to trees.
foxglove: A tall flower with bell-shaped blooms.
bougainvillea: A colorful, flowering vine with papery blooms.
camellia: A large, rose-like flower that blooms in winter.
mallow: A small, colorful flower with a hibiscus-like shape.
mexican petunia: A purple, trumpet-shaped flower with long stems.
bromelia: A tropical plant with a bright, spiky flower.
blanket flower: A daisy-like flower with red and yellow petals.
trumpet creeper: A climbing plant with large, trumpet-shaped flowers.
blackberry lily: A bright orange flower with black seeds.
